2011320.name: Perfect Boyfriend
2011320.description:
Dream Boyfriend is a dating sim where you meet five different guys. Spend time with them, find more about their personalities and just have fun!

CHARACTERS




Viktor, 23 - a young entrepreneur. He is charismatic, a little selfish and narcissistic, but very clever. In just 5 years, he managed to build many profitable businesses in this city on his own, although few people believe that he really did it himself.



David, 28 - a freelance programmer with kind heart. He is always calm, likes handwork, pottert and reading. He is also good at cooking, so his friends sometimes call him "the perfect husband" as a joke.



Idris, 19 - a young university student with big dreams. Loves space, science, hip-hop and skates. Friends describe him as an enthusiastic, energetic, humorous and intelligent person.



Mark, 21 - a local uprising rockstar, the most popular guy in college. Likes collecting guitars, pedals and vinyl records. Although he seems rude at first, his friends describe him as a very friendly person.



Oliver, 20 - studies at the choreographic academy, has a part-time job. He's bold and confident, so don't be fooled by his looks. In addition, he is also very romantic and sensible with his beloved ones.
